text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā ga, onmegumi to shite anata gata ni kudasa reta mono o kangaete mi nasai. Naze anata gata wa sono (ichibu o) higōhō to shi, mata (ichibu o) gōhō to shita no ka.' Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā ga anata gata ni yurusa reta no ka, soretomo anata gataga arrā ni tsuite netsuzō shita no ka.'
